ai-patthana7.18:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana7.18:1.1_0: Mind consciousness doesn’t give rise to the ear. Cause it doesn’t give rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana7.18:2.1_0: The cause and condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.18:2.1_1: The cause and condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.18:2.1_2: Though the teaching is not the cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.18:3.1_0: No matter what this is the cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.18:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the teachings.
ai-patthana7.18:3.1_2: No matter what is the cause or condition for the teachings they don’t each other.
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_0: And they don’t grant the teachings.
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_1: And they don’t shine for the sake of the teachings or for the cause to listen.
ai-patthana7.18:4.1_2: No matter what they’ve gone to the charnel ground and not in the teachings, there’s no cause or reason for the teaching.
ai-patthana7.18:5.1_0: the eighteen bases for psychic power ...
ai-patthana7.18:5.1_1: Those eighteen years old are born in a womb ...
